tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** ** *** ******** His after care and follow up is amazing. I've under gone angioplasty on 4th October 2018 around 3.45 pm and shifted to ICCU by 4.30. He came to my bed 5.15 just before leaving the hospital, that's not a end of story.  He called ICCU nurse Jayakodi by 11.15pm and checked on my condition and checked all monitor readings. I was amazed by this action.
he has been a good doctor. he has explained the case in hand well. the whole experience was good. good job
He is a very very nice person.good responsible person.Very good treatment.then reasonable fees.so visite doctor.tell ur problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is a very experienced doctor... And explains everything very patiently and clearly. Doesn't prescribe unnecessary tests to be done. Very professional and very friendly!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I strongly recommend him. My dad got his angioplasty done by him. He cleared all our doubts and was very friendly.  He explains the issue in detail and also the procedure.
Very precise in diagnosis. very confident. puts us in the right direction.
he has cured me when I was really sick. the staff and service is good
The doctor was very patient. answered most of my queries. There is always more scope for improvement.
he was absolutely good. staff is very cordial. the security can be taken care of
